channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

Report X-2023100878

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking and given to QA to inspect. DescribePack: 2 of the drums were dented and the top of the cans were pushed in forcing the lids to loosen up DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was placed in a tote and given to QA to inspect.

item.title: Report X-2023100846
item.description:
Report X-2023100846

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found the box in the hazmat cage. DescribePack: Upon inspection found the box wet and with a hole in it. once opened found that one of four bottles of ethanol solutions has a loose and broken cap. a small Amount leaked out causing the box to be damaged. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All was put into the in the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023100659
item.description:
Report X-2023100659

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-14T18:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: EAU CLAIRE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found loaded incorrectly, near back wall of trailer on its side. after discovering it was leaking, it was placed into a black bin and moved to the ventilation area in the hazmat cage while going through procedure, until it was eventually repacked and awaiting disposition DescribePack: All 4 of the bottles contained loose caps, however only one of them managed to leak. Lost about 3/4 of its contents, causing it to soak into the fiberboard packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: box was positioned up right as soon as it was discovered and brought to QA's attention immediately

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO, CLEANED UP, AND TRANSPORTED PACKAGE TO DMP.RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGE CONTAINED LOOSE CAPS ON PLASTIC BOTTLES. RESPONDER PROCESSED THROUGH DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023100437
item.description:
Report X-2023100437

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: LEAKING PACKAGE BROUGHT TO DMP BY RESPONDER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED THERE WERE AEROSOL CANS IN THE PACKAGE THOUGH THE BOX DID NOT HAVE ANY HAZARDOUS MARKINGS ON THE OUTSIDE. A DIFFERENT ITEM, NON-HAZARDOUS, IN THE BOX WAS LEAKING BUT THE RMP WAS NOTIFIED ABOUT THE AEROSOLS IN AN UNDECLARED BOX. RMP TOOK PICTURES, CALLED THE HAZMAT HELP DESK.

Report X-2023100021

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: OAK CREEK
  • State: WI

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO BLACK BELT FOR LEAKING HAZMAT PACKAGE. SPILL WAS CONTAINED AND TAKEN TO DMP FOR PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION, RESPONDER NOTED THAT THE CAPS OF 2 OF THE BOTTLES WERE LOOSE AND LEAKING.

item.title: Report X-2023100527
item.description:
Report X-2023100527

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-27
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1.X-2023100527 SequenceEvent: found in the hazmat cage. did inspection found there to be leaking. DescribePack: both of the plastic jerry cans have leaked out their caps, the caps appear tight but crossed threaded. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: all was put into the hazmat cage, then into a plastic spill bag and a black tote. 2. X-2023100528 SequenceEvent: found the box wet and in the hazmat cage. DescribePack: once opened found that both of the plastic jerry cans have leaked a small amount of their contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: all was put into the hazmat cage in black tote and in a plastic spill bag.

item.title: Report X-2023100526
item.description:
Report X-2023100526

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-27
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found the box in the hazmat cage, upon inspection found the box to look as though the top has damaged from a drop? DescribePack: The box has damage to the top that indicates a drop from the sorting line or due to the P.H. the bottom is also damaged and wet, as if when turned back over the contents leaked down the sides and damaged the box on the bottom. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All was put into the hazmat cage inside of a plastic spill bag, and then into a tote.

item.title: Report X-2023100525
item.description:
Report X-2023100525

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-27
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Found the box in the hazmat cage. preformed an inspection. DescribePack: Found the box to be wet and corroding. once opened found there to be 2 plastic bottles, both have child proof caps but no inner bottle seals. It appears as though the box may have been dropped or fell off of the sorting line? Both bottles have leaked a small amount of their contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All was put into the hazmat cage in a plastic spill bag and in a black tote.
